website_summaries.verdict: It's similar and edged out only slightly by the Rachael Ray set.
pros: Steel core precisely distributes heat for consistent results
Nonstick layered design effortlessly releases food
cons: Finish has a tendency to scratch

customer_reviews.title: Cookie sheet rusted
customer_reviews.text: Because of the curved fold in the cookie sheet water gets stuck in it and the side has already started to rust
customer_reviews.author: MNewman

customer_reviews.title: Half sheet warped
customer_reviews.text: The set looks great, but the half sheet warped with the first use at 400F.
customer_reviews.author: Teardrop Camper

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two, one for me and one for a wedding gift. Really appreciate that utensils can be used and product is warranted for life. Won’t be consuming this nonstick coating. Have other products from this company and coating has not failed.
customer_reviews.author: JackieTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Love my new baking set
customer_reviews.text: Love my new baking set. Finally was able to get rid of all the old stuff, fast delivery, packaging was right on. Quality is great
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Lamkin

customer_reviews.title: terrible!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used it 3 times..... First time baking with sheet pan , opposite edges curled up @ 400 degrees Second time using muffin pan....bottom of muffins burned while top was a golden brown Third time , muffin pan again but used muffin tins.....came out better but the open cups I didnt use came out with brownish spots that cant be removed no matter what I do.... Overall...STAY AWAY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: sylvia salony

customer_reviews.title: I love how much comes with this set
customer_reviews.text: I love how much comes with this set. The only downside is that the cookie sheet and muffin tray get water caught underneath its sides in the dishwasher and then brown water comes out when you take it out of the dishwasher :/
customer_reviews.author: domf

customer_reviews.title: Great but...
customer_reviews.text: These are great pans except for the the cake pan and the bread pans have folds in the corners making them hard to clean. You would think for the price the design would be better? Otherwise they are non-stick and made of heavy metal.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathon

customer_reviews.title: Great pans
customer_reviews.text: don't like the lip under the edges. i put them in the dishwasher before the first use and got rusty water coming from the seams. Will not put in dishwasher again.
customer_reviews.author: Gtil

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this
customer_reviews.text: I love the quantity for the money, this bakeware set was easy to clean and use however the baking sheet rusted after second wash.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set of baking pans. Compared to other options, good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: tgowan

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: I love these pan thick durable and so far nothing has stuck.
customer_reviews.author: ANGIE ROSSI

customer_reviews.title: Baking set is fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my daughter. She loved them 🎉❤️🎉 Always a good purchase from Calphalon. Thanks, Amazon for having a great deal on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Mezatis

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of Calphalon so I was excited to find this set! Perfect set for all the basic baking necessities
customer_reviews.author: DAS

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, sturdy and great Calphalon quality!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot wait to use every piece. The loaf pan is a little on the small side, but there are times where you need a smaller loaf pan too! Would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Jen S.

customer_reviews.title: Good basic set
customer_reviews.text: Calphalon--known for its quality, this bakeware set offers a good variety of sizes for the home baker. It is well constructed and the non-stick feature is also a plus. I purchased this because Calphalon cookware has alway performed extremely well for me, however, I purchased this set as a Christmas gift and will have to wait to see how my daughter likes them since, she is the recipient.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Bug

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price for these pans however these pans stain very easy after every use
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it! Don't drop a piece on your foot ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Don't drop a piece on your foot though...sturdy stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set.
customer_reviews.text: Great pieces for the price. Nice starter set for first time baker.
customer_reviews.author: maria swanson

customer_reviews.title: Great set, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Great set, reasonable price. I picked a "used like new" set to save 35% and my biggest pan had a dent in it which warped the rim enough to get rust up under the lip in that one spot, but still a good deal. The rust is on the outside even if anyone else has this issue, so it doesn't affect the food. I figure I'll get a year or 3 out of it and even if I have to replace the one piece it'll still be less than the full price of buying the set new. I love the lid for the cake tin! So handy to not have to deal with cling wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Alan L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, great brand
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Great brand. I work at Macys and even with my discount I couldn't get a similar set for nearly the price I got it for on Amazon. I think it's a bit dated (harshly poointed corners on the bread and brownie pans), but that's no big deal. I'm really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Warped on first use
customer_reviews.text: The baking sheet warped very heavily on my first use (425 degrees, middle of my oven). I expected more from this set due to the history of the brand. Potentially will update my rating if the other pieces are solid, but the baking sheet is only useable to for things that won't slide into the corner...
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Trust the reviews!!!
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the reviews!! The cookie sheet does warp at 350 degrees and I received the lid to the cake pan damaged!! Waiting for a replacement from the company which will take 30 business days!!!
customer_reviews.author: Squigy

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Despite the claim that it's nonstick, they stick and stain a lot. Also wrap easily. Avoid!
customer_reviews.author: Susy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set! Excellent quality. Scratch resistant and non stick quality really good. These will last quite a while
customer_reviews.author: SOMASD

customer_reviews.title: crap
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these beautiful pans and they are ruined..dont waste money
customer_reviews.author: Pelusa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love them so easy to keep clean and use they are perfect size and I just love them
customer_reviews.author: Imcrzy4h2o

customer_reviews.title: Baking
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t tested them out yet they seem to be made well I’m extremely happy with them
customer_reviews.author: trace conrad

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in these. Calphalon really dropped the ball on this set... my 2 rimmed baking pans have burned through the pan despite taking excellent care of them. DONT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Cranston

customer_reviews.title: Good Baking Set
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set of baking pans. Easy to clean and get items out of pans.
customer_reviews.author: Doku83

customer_reviews.title: They are sturdy pans
customer_reviews.text: They feel very sturdy in your hands. Have used some of them for baking and no buckling yet. Mind you, I have not used them in temperature higher than 350 F yet.
customer_reviews.author: Liza Yip

customer_reviews.title: Great bakeware set at an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Great bakeware set at an excellent price! Calphalon is my favorite cookware, so I was confident that this bakeware would be great as well.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lightsey

customer_reviews.title: Wish it came with a smaller brownie pan
customer_reviews.text: Like it but wish it came with a smaller brownie pan. I made a box of brownies and it barely filled half the brownie sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Former pro chef's daily goto ....
customer_reviews.text: I have used my own set for years. Purchased this as a starter set for my granddaughter for a Christmas gift. She has fallen in love with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is superb and looks amazing too!
customer_reviews.text: It's Calphalon! I expect nothing less. Quality is superb and looks amazing too!
customer_reviews.author: CBryant

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It a very nice set and it come with everything you need for baking.
customer_reviews.author: thanh duyen le

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, thick metal and high quality non-stick coating make this a really nice set to use.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H.

customer_reviews.title: Good set of bakeware at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Good set of bakeware at a great price. Finish has a tendency to flake off even when using recommended sponges and following proper care instructions. Happy overall.
customer_reviews.author: EdmondD

customer_reviews.title: Great cake pans
customer_reviews.text: I got this set mainly for the cake pans. They are amazing. No sticking at all - the cakes just basically fall out. Other items are useful too.
customer_reviews.author: Karet

customer_reviews.title: and the couple that received his just love it. Said they don't even have to grease ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, and the couple that received his just love it. Said they don't even have to grease the pans, as stuff just falls out when turned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Don Gee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not bad product, not sure if its worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: TeamLeader

product_meta.title: Calphalon Nonstick Bakeware 10-pc. Bakeware Set
product_meta.description: Size:10-pcThis comprehensive set include everything you need to create amazing desserts, cookies, cakes and more. This large set includes a 12 Cup Muffin Pan, 12"x17" Baking Sheet, 14"x17" Cookie Sheet, Medium Loaf Pan, two 9" Round Cake Pans, 9"x13" Brownie Pan, 9"x13" Covered Cake Pan and Cooling Rack. The Cake Pan cover will also fit the Brownie Pan for easy storage or transportation. Calphalon Nonstick Bakeware has interlocking nonstick layers to deliver high performance release. In fact, it releases up to 2 times better than Calphalon Classic Bakeware. Now, even the stickiest baked goods can be removed cleanly for beautiful results and easy cleanup. Heavy-gauge steel core heats evenly. Dishwasher safe. Full lifetime warranty.
feature_bullets: 10pc Set: Large Cookie Sheet, 12" x 17" Baking Sheet, 9" Round cake pan (2), 9" x 13" brownie pan, 9" x 13" cake pan, Cooling rack, Lid for 9" x 13" Cake & Brownie, Medium loaf pan, 12 cup muffin pan
Releases up to 2X better than Calphalon Classic Bakeware
Interlocking nonstick layers for high-performance release

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars174 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
